header.title: SHEET2JSON
header.text: Paste the URL and name of your Google sheet to generate JSON.

success.headline: JSON data fetched
success.message: You can now use your JSON data.

error.headline: Ooops - could not fetch JSON data
error.message: Please check the URL and name of your sheet. Make sure that you set the visibility to public within Google sheets.

text.large: This app benefits from the api of Ben Borgers. Check out his blog post and api description. Cheers!
text.small: This app benefits from the api of Ben Borgers. Cheers!

404.title: 404 error
404.headline: Page not found.
404.text: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
